Description:
Titled In The Rise
Create something special on this 517m2 approx. rectangular, level surfaced, prime piece of real estate, enviably situated in Officer’s most in-demand, The Rise Estate within minutes’ drive from elite schools, freeway access, Arena Shopping Center and the trendy eateries and shops of Beaconsfield. Positioned among attractive, established homes with a 16m frontage, overlooking a grassy reserve to enjoy, this family friendly locale close to all amenities is the prime opportunity to construct your dream home. An opportunity not to be missed – call today for further details.

Description:
ACROSS FROM THE PARK!
Located in highly sought-after Officer within “The Rise at Officer” estate, this titled 452m² block offers ample potential to build your dream home.
Surrounded by parkland, schools (St Brigid's Catholic Primary School, Officer Primary School, Beaconsfield Primary School, Maranatha Junior School and St Francis Xavier College) as well as being close to all amenities and only a short drive to Arena Shopping Centre and Beaconsfield Shopping Village, this is one you don't want to miss out on.
For further information contact Samantha on 0478 178 618 today.

Description:
Style and Space in Tranquil Timbertop
Escape the hustle and bustle of life to this 5-bedroom sanctuary in the Timbertop Estate - a premium master-planned community revered for its open spaces, country feel and convenience.
Sidestep the building process and slide straight into this near-new 6-Star Energy Rated luxury home 40 minutes to Melbourne (approx) and next door to an award-winning winery!
The bespoke single-level domain is less than 2 years old and presents as if new. Enjoy premium inclusions, easy freeway access, low-maintenance landscaped gardens, schools close by and a short drive (approx) to Officer Station and to Beaconsfield and Officer shops.
The home enjoys a gently elevated 560m2 (approx) allotment on the high side of a quiet street, strolling distance to the estate’s reserve, walking tracks and lakeside cafe.
Retreat and relax in 3 stylish living rooms (including a theatre room), 2 outdoor living zones, a spacious kitchen and 5 generous bedrooms.
The one-owner home has been designed with luxury in mind. Discover high ceilings throughout, zoned living, walk-in robes to 3 of the secondary bedrooms and a plush master suite with a walk-in robe, a stone-topped double vanity and a double shower with a full-length recessed shelf.
The deluxe stone and stainless steel kitchen features 40mm bench tops, a breakfast island bench with an undermount sink, a 900mm oven and gas cooktop, textured tile splashbacks and a butler’s pantry!
Stacker doors spill onto a covered alfresco terrace with polished concrete under foot and a sun blind. Step up to a private sun deck designed for enjoying the northern sunshine.
Other appointments include a remote double garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ceiling fans, a 4.5kW solar system, a stone-topped family bathroom and more. Nothing needs to be done, leaving you to enjoy the lifestyle.
Insights: 16 Denman Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN FLOOR PLAN CLOSE TO SHOPS – OFFICER LOCATION!
So much to offer "still waters run deep"
Completed in 2011 this cleverly designed home is positioned in the much sought- after Officer postcode, just 400m from the Arena Shopping Centre with supermarket, pharmacy, post office, cafés and a medical centre. Add to this schools and the Cardinia Train Station also being walkable and you begin to understand the lifestyle on offer.
This sundrenched home offers a separate formal lounge and open plan family area that includes living/dining and a kitchen with stainless steel wall oven and cooktop, dishwasher and large breakfast bar for casual meals. The master bedroom has a WIR and ensuite, while the remaining bedrooms have BIR's and share the main bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet. An additional study or front office provides more options for schooling needs or running a business from home. Outside, the property is fully fenced with easy care gardens and a timber deck for entertaining or dining.
Extras include GDH, instant gas hot water, quality curtains and blinds, oversized remote double garage with internal access and rear roller door.
This neat as a pin home will not last, call to arrange your immediate inspection!
Insights: 25 Still Water Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
A real show stopper – Stunning family home
Spotlessly presented, this as new, stylish family home of approx. 30 squares (URL) leaves you nothing to do except enjoy the magnificent lifestyle on offer. Walking distance to schools, major shopping precincts and only 3 minutes to the M1 freeway and the train station ensures you will see excellent capital growth for years to come. A unique design the home offers luxury inclusions like;
- 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with full en-suite and W.I.R. with a second bathroom for the kids and guests.
- A fully appointed kitchen with 900mm freestanding, s/steel cooker, stone bench tops and uniquely designed breakfast bar.
- A huge tiled family room with split system air-con, alfresco dining area, formal lounge and tiled hallway.
Set amongst established gardens and surrounded by quality homes in a sort after neighbourhood, this is one of the fastest growth corridors in the country. Only a couple of years old, our vendor has priced this incredible property to sell. Entertain in style and have your friends green with envy but be quick.

Description:
QUALITY ARENA LOCATION - OPPOSITE PARK
An ideal location that allows an easy walk to the shopping centre, transport – bus and rail and schooling. A lovely parkland opposite provides an open feel to the area while the home itself is well presented and caters for all the family needs. There are 3 good sized bedrooms, ensuite and WIR to the main, separate lounge room has the park outlook while the family rumpus at the rear make for great everyday living. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling help make life comfortable all year round. The modern kitchen has stone benches, 900mm cooking, ample bench and cupboard space along with a built in pantry. The alfresco area is paved and private, this low maintenance property enjoys space while not having the huge upkeep. Ideal for home owners or investors. Great location and plenty of benefits all round.

Description:
Modern family home – Arena Estate Officer
The moment you drive into the Arena Estate, you will delight in the expanse of picturesque parklands and wetlands, the community sports fields and of course the convenience of having major shopping precincts, freeway access and the Princes Hwy right at your door step. This is easy living at its finest and you will have your friends green with envy.
Presented to the absolute highest standard this stunning Rawdon Hill home boasts an array of impressive features which include:
- 4 Bedrooms – Master with full ensuite and walk in robe. Second bathroom located to the rear of the home and servicing remaining bedrooms.
- Fully appointed kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven, and dishwasher and butler's pantry.
- 2 Separate living areas – featuring open plan kitchen, meals and family room plus separate formal lounge.
- Ducted gas central heating & split system A/C.
- Double lock up garage
Set on approx. 400m2 this low maintenance block is ideally located only a few short minutes' walk to Arena Plaza with all its shops and cafes, St Francis Xavier college, St Clare's Primary, public transport and only a few minutes' drive to the M1 Freeway.
Call Brad Townsend TODAY to book your private inspection!

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Situated in the popular Potters North Estate close to schools, shops, transport, sporting facilities and the Monash Freeway this quality home will quite simply make you the envy of all who visit.
With a list of desirable features simply too long to mention we can only do our best to try and paint a picture.
Boasting formal entrance, bedroom downstairs with semi-ensuite, very well appointed kitchen with 900mm oven, dishwasher and large walk-in pantry which overlooks your spacious meals/family room. Large bedrooms contain walk-in robe's, master with full ensuite with stone benchtops and double vanity and walk-in robe, huge living room upstairs, gas ducted heating throughout, split system air conditioning, intercom, double lock up garage with rear access and the list goes on.
If you enjoy entertaining then look no further as this beautiful home comes fully equipped with a covered outdoor entertaining area and low maintenance rear yard which leads off from the meals/family room and would be perfect for the most fun filled days with family and friends all year round.
With everything you could ever want or need in the highest levels of quality family living this property represents a fantastic opportunity for the astute buyer. Inspection we can assure you will not disappoint.
Proudly marketed by Knox's Number 1 Agency
Thinking of selling? Call us today; Boronia office on 9761 2277, Wantirna office on 9800 1225, Rowville office on 9755 6666, Bayswater office on 9720 3030 or Ferntree Gully office on 9752 2889.
TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST click on either of the following tabs and fill in your details, BOOK AN INSPECTION on the Biggin & Scott website or EMAIL AGENT / CONTACT AGENT on Real Estate.com.au and other websites. You will be contacted by one of our agents and will also receive a text advising of inspection times.

Description:
SIMPLY IMMACULATE!
Situated within the ever-popular Arcadia Estate in Officer, this deceivingly spacious four bedroom is beautifully presented and designed for family living!
The hostess kitchen complete with upgraded stainless steel appliances, ample storage and plumbed purified water system to the fridge cavity, overlooks the light filled meals area and family living room, opening seamlessly to the undercover alfresco fitted with café blinds.
The accommodation comprises of four generous bedrooms – master suite complete with walk in robe and ensuite, whilst the remaining bedrooms are serviced by a central family bathroom.
Additional features include, ducted heating, evaporative air conditioning, 7 solar panels, alarm system and 4 security cameras, on a low maintenance 300m² allotment, making this an opportunity not to be missed.
Only a stone's throw from the Cardinia Road and Officer train stations, child care centres, Officer Secondary & Officer Specialist School, reserves, enclosed dog park, supermarkets and specialty shops – this home is ideal for either a first home buyer, astute investor, or downsizer. An inspection will not disappoint!

Description:
When Quality And Style Matter
This stylish home is perfectly positioned in the ever-popular Timbertop Estate, built to the highest standard by a private builder, you will not be disappointed at every premium fitting that has been put into this home. Upon entry you are greeted with a modern rendered façade, a wide airy hallway that leads you through to the heart of the home, whilst giving the feeling of style and sophistication highlighting its high-end fittings and finishes along the way. The vast master bedroom is located at the front of the home featuring dressing room and hotel-inspired ensuite bathroom with separate toilet. This package has it all, 2 separate sizeable living zones and a beautiful central kitchen with caesarstone benches, double oven, induction hotplates and walk-in-pantry. Two further generous bedrooms with built in robes and separate study nook are quietly situated off the hallway. One of the secondary bedrooms has direct access to the main bathroom, so visitors and teenagers will never want to leave! The fourth bedroom/nursery is near the master and could also double as a third living space or home office, depending on your family’s needs. Entertaining is effortless flowing from the inside to the outside with an intimate north facing alfresco area, a place to relax on weekends and still plenty of room for the kids to play in the secure, fully landscaped backyard. There is an extensive list of extras included such as ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling and split system reverse cycle heating and cooling, security doors, front and back awnings, double remote-controlled garage with internal access and garden shed. This home has everything any first home buyer, downsizer, family or investor would desire - it’s a must to inspect.

Description:
Perfect Starter in Potters Grove!
Showcasing this impeccable home with its modern façade, situated in the highly sought-after Potters Grove Estate, this home is perfect to make treasured memories of your own or the perfect addition to your portfolio.
This sophisticated home comprises of spacious light filled open plan living with meals and kitchen. The contemporary kitchen is tailored with exceptional fixtures and fittings, stone benches, stainless steel appliances, window splashback, oversized walk-in pantry and overhead cabinetry.
The master bedroom includes walk in robe and private ensuite with stone benches. Additional two bedrooms fitted with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom with stone benches.
When entertaining is what you like, then look no further! This huge decking area is perfect for entertaining family and friends while flowing on for the indoor living zone.
Ducted heating and split system air conditioning, solar panels, single remote-control garage and quality carpets and tiles throughout.
Situated close to shops, transport, freeway and schools, this home is exactly what you’ve been looking for.
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
"Picturesque Property in Perfect Location"
This stylish home is perfectly positioned in a quiet street within walking distance to the Arena Shopping Centre. Upon arrival you are charmed by the plantation shutters and beautiful Tasmanian Oak parquetry flooring which features throughout the home, there is a feeling of style, space and light. The home features spacious Master bedroom at the front of the home with walk-in-robe and modern ensuite bathroom. There are three separate generous living zones and a beautiful kitchen with Caesar-stone benches and walk-in-pantry. Two further generous bedrooms are quietly situated at the rear of the home and are serviced by the family bathroom, separate toilet and a light and bright laundry. There are two split systems which provide heating and cooling to the home. The rear of the property opens via sliding doors to a covered alfresco which flows onto a pretty grassed garden area with Ornamental Pear trees along the fence line for privacy. The perfect space for children to play! Be quick to inspect – this one won't last! Contact Michelle Hansford TODAY on 0421 450 558

Description:
UNIQUE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
This level block is the carpark for the Grandvue land sales office. It is currently leased at a great return with a 3% increase each year. There are 2 years left to run on the lease.
Once the land sales office closes, this bock will be a brilliant place to build your new home or investment property.
Close to the Arena @ Officer shopping complex, school and public transport. The allotment is 530m2.
